title: +Daniel Radcliffe I know your are a fan of the Indian cricketer Sachin Tendulkar so I wanted to share...

attachments.displayName:
+Daniel Radcliffe I know your are a fan of the Indian cricketer Sachin Tendulkar so I wanted to share this with you as I'm a big fan of Sachin Tendulker and you.He is going to retire in November this year.He is playing his 200th and last match at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai November 14-18.I hope you get this post ! :)
I'm very excited to hear that you are going to star in a new movie called "Gold" as an athlete,Olympic winner and Politician Sebastian Cole.Good luck for the movie :)

object.content:
+Daniel Radcliffe I know your are a fan of the Indian cricketer Sachin Tendulkar so I wanted to share this with you as I'm a big fan of Sachin Tendulker and you.He is going to retire in November this year.He is playing his 200th and last match at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai November 14-18.I hope you get this post ! :)
I'm very excited to hear that you are going to star in a new movie called "Gold" as an athlete,Olympic winner and Politician Sebastian Cole.Good luck for the movie :)
